channel.title: Project Insenthium - The evolution of PI
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/T9E2J.png[/img][/center]Well i decided to start a project along with 2 friends, i actually looks forwards to giving PI a new reputation. We are currently planning on doing some house keeping and redoing a few methods so we can slightly improve project insanity's performance [hr] [b]Developers[/b] Mod Tony Mod Den Mod Austin Mod Revival Mod Nick [hr] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [b]Combat[/b] Perfect weapon speeds Correct weapon animations A perfect max hit formula Special attack [img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b] All modern combat spells All ancient combat spells Alching, Enchanting [img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Range[/b] All bows range able Throwing weapons [img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b] Not started [img]http://i.imgur.com/QusJe.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b] Not started [img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b] All fish can be caught Correct item requirements Correct animations [img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b] All fish can be cooked [COLOR="Yellow"]All meats can be cooked[/COLOR] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [b]Wood Cutting[/b] All Trees Cut able [img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]FireMaking[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [b]Agility[/b] Gnome Agility Course Force movement mask Correct animations used [img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [b]Herblore[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b]Thieving[/b] Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards [img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]RuneCrafting[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img] [b]Fletching[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img] [b]Farming[/b] Not Started [img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [b]Minigames[/b] Duel Arena Pest Control Fight Pits [COLOR="Yellow"]Barrows[/COLOR] Mage Arena [COLOR="Yellow"]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [hr]
Single Doors modified cycle even system 99 skill reward modified via Eclipse comp cape interface (going to change sprites, have to do server sided still) client splash (finish last thing) added godwars speach base memory usage handled properly now | client.java search : private static void handleMemoryUsage() { global digging players will be kicked after 5 mins afk champion scrolls (mini-game only) yo-yo with emotes improved runescape range max hit ratio rocktail fishing completed (just need to make a few minor tweaks) - big fishing net style btw full shop prices for every item made (before some items cost 1 gp) glider system added moved curses alter (gnome glider -> Saldric -> whinch | will add requirements to enter later on) Treasure trails completed moulding system 100% - actionhandler under object switch statement is the interface method modified jewelry enchantment flax system + object disappearing & reappearing + timer birds nests random event ring of wealth (completely works I tried it on KBD) super heat base cow milking sailing teletabs - Ardougne, Watchtower, Camelot, Falador, Lumbridge, Varrock ticket system (::help *reason*) needs to be worked on majorly fixed dharoks attack anims (now has proper anims for different attack styles) working marionette anims - 6866 antifire pots empty ALL vials 100% cant teleport during combat fixed x-logging & the dupe method for it Phoenix necklace completed potato making base (just do useitem) bolt crafting base enhanced farming & supporting multi patches (un-finished) ring of dueling - needs to be fixed in clickingbuttons.java and then it's perfect trade accepted - dupe fix well system completed -> itemonobject class drop warning (example: drop AGS and it'll open a interface asking if you'd like to validate your action before hand) lunar hunter kit system perfected + required level, etc.. tanning hides - need to be fixed (clickingbuttons, and items on the interface) | interface ID = 14670 re-written fletching class, just need to add right click amounts cleaned out warnings from skill classses -> runecrafting, fishing, mining random event system - woodcutting, thieving, crafting force emote command - ::allvetemote clean out command - removes bank, worn, inv items on any user this command is used on. total in-game time npc give you veteran cape after 30 days (going to make changes though) commented out idlelogout method (IdleLogout.java - case 202) Standing on NPC fix (you can still talk to npcs if you're standing on them) math command (your choice to add rewards or not) dupe fix in bankx2.java ladder system 100% added casket system added close to 100 bank references (npcs, objects in which open up your bank) new level up GFX fixed stuck in duel arena bug sgs proper special attack (restores HP) added 100% exact runescape dialogues for Jad (enterance, reward, tiny reward for leaving the caves manually) all 63 waves of jad have now been added + npc effects 100% - needs mroe working on though asap Better Block Emotes - Combatassistant class godwars npcs are agress unless you have their gods armor (example: bandos room | no bandos armor in inv/wearing = npcs attacking you. Vice versa then they won't attack you (if you do have bandos on you) Npc death animation timer fix custom command for admins (max hybriding set) improved firemaking + clipped (only thing that needs work is = player starts fire and automaticly appears then 3 seconds later finishes the firemaking anim itself) god book creation 100% god book preaching low & high alching dupe fixed overload creation completed + requirements & exp reward prevent users from having the following in their names: mod", "Mod", "admin", "Admin", "owner", "Owner" healing monkey guards box sets (chisel on box = armor type death player - username: Death pass: 1234 (makes you look like death the NPC instead of regular character) open bank anywhere cheat exploit (anyone using bank cheat will be exploited over a server yell about it) ring of slaying limestone brick system (587 will allow you to make perfect bars, withouit it you'll take 8 damage and get nothing in return) | IDS: 3211 (limestone), 587 Limestone, 3420 Limestone bar inproved edgeville lever (over by coffins) - dialogues, warnings, returning back to edgeville warn command (how to use: ::warn_name space_message) itemonplayer class christmas cracker quest handler system cooks assistant quest started world map button 100% now duel arena log out fix (user logs out the opponent wins armor trimming (requirements varies on the armors iteself | example: rune trimmed you'd need to have 99 smithing, 90 smithing to trim black armor) fixed barrage orb veng on npc random event system for prayer re-written runecrafting (supports: multi runes, pouches, both ess types (each based on their own exp ratio) rouge den wall safes fixed Glitched Following (hard to explaing, but dw about it now) cant teleport out of fight pits minigame fix 500 total levels to trade wilderness warning sign (only bug is that it's level 1 wild when interface shows) better skill handler improved fletching improved runecrafting emotes handler system completed (handles emotes tab actions in a new class | EmoteHandler.java) brand new trade screen + wealth system (only 1 tiny bug that doesn't even matter really) improved Agility (supports: gnome agility course, Wildy course, barbarian outpost course, Brimhaven agility course, *MORE LATER*) + 99.5% anims & delays custom bonfires (needs delay and overall better handling) fixed alching dupe fixed trade bug (other player would offer items -> you click minimap and their items disapear) prospecting + timer flax spinning (item on object per *for now at least*) key theft @ crafting guild is now elimanated since mould interface set up with crafting guilds Poterry oven 2 floors for crafting guild *need bank to be on second floor though* -Nick [4-10-12] Finally had some time to try n fix it. Fixed it :) -Nick [5-10-12] Recoded woodcutting. Fist of guthix [60%] added all the safe coordinates added target assignment object interaction point counter area depending on the region your in append damage system when your within the safe house interfaces invalid items data [missing some food, etc] Bounty hunter Barbarian Assault [30%] we have to hard code the interface for recruitment clans I already hard coded the item for it. Theres more to do Map data -Nex -Tormented Demons -Cool cave from the 614 revision - fixed certain 525 objects Sound System Music System Rewrote Prayer -Supports altar with sounds -Handled all data through an enum -Supports bone burying 10/1/12 -Fixed the cfg null load -Fixed the single doors -Added Double Doors 10/2/12 -Completely Rewrote Cooking Using grahams Cycle Event -Added Sound Support to all items -Added more data :) cooking is 70% -Rewriting the burning formula soon Started on the fishing base :D [10/6/12] Rewrote Firemaking Started on grand exchange --------------Client Updates-------------------------- Buffering System Renamed a few methods .Dat Loading System Cache Packaging method Camera Angle region system --------------Misc--------------------------- Started working on the server framework for our chat Started working on the client using sockets Still more to come~
[hr] [b]OutDated Media[/b]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/qipb7q4gr/barbarianassault.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/cdji5wvff/coolcave.png[/img] [img]http://s17.postimage.org/4qulhmy33/corpbeast.png[/img] [img]http://s10.postimage.org/lpiaug1t5/tormdemons.png[/img] [img]http://s11.postimage.org/jq0dyn8z7/nex.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimage.org/f96u60iv5/construction.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimage.org/f28gus5zl/summoningclipping.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimage.org/xk8d03hvp/fog1.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/zd5w69emj/fog2.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimage.org/4u7yv8myp/bounty.png[/img] [img]http://s16.postimage.org/af19gy4p1/barbarianassault.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimage.org/6dgb7rf91/32players.png[/img]

item.title: Project Insenthium - The evolution of PI
item.dc:creator: @508Reject 508Reject
item.description:
@508Reject wrote:

Thanks for the feedback guys

@fridder block stone sprite? Do you mean protect from magic? :o

Updates
Added sounds to fletching
Added sounds to firemaking
Interface support for cooking
Fixed the portal spec null
Fixed pestcontrol

~ More updates to come
What to expect from me
Improved pestcontrol
Object updating
Void knight
Npc spawns
Breaking doors

Gravestones (debating on it :))
-Grave timer
-interfaces
-updating object
-hint icons

Summoning base
-writing it from scratch using an enumeration array

Read full topic
item.source: Project Insenthium - The evolution of PI

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“508Reject, post:4, topic:463399”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=566838.msg4120404#msg4120404 date=1349645700]
Fix your BBCodes.
[/quote]

Just did thanks, although does this version of smf support spoilers?[/quote]
No version of SMF comes with a spoiler tag, it’s a modification. We do not use this.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insenthium - The evolution of PI
item.dc:creator: @508Reject 508Reject
item.description:
@508Reject wrote:

[center][/center]Well i decided to start a project along with 2 friends, i actually looks forwards to giving PI a new reputation.
We are currently planning on doing some house keeping and redoing a few methods so we can slightly improve project insanity’s performance

[hr]
Developers
Mod Tony
Mod Den
Mod Austin
Mod Revival
Mod Nick

[hr]
Combat
Perfect weapon speeds
Correct weapon animations
A perfect max hit formula
Special attack

Magic
All modern combat spells
All ancient combat spells
Alching, Enchanting

Range
All bows range able
Throwing weapons

Prayer
Not started

Mining
Not started

Fishing
All fish can be caught
Correct item requirements
Correct animations

Cooking
All fish can be cooked
[COLOR=“Yellow”]All meats can be cooked[/COLOR]

Wood Cutting
All Trees Cut able

FireMaking
Not Started

Agility
Gnome Agility Course
Force movement mask
Correct animations used

Herblore
Not Started

Thieving
Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards

Crafting
Not Started

RuneCrafting
Not Started

Fletching
Not Started

Farming
Not Started

Minigames
Duel Arena
Pest Control
Fight Pits
[COLOR=“Yellow”]Barrows[/COLOR]
Mage Arena
[COLOR=“Yellow”]Fight Caves[/COLOR]

[hr]

Single Doors modified cycle even system 99 skill reward modified via Eclipse comp cape interface (going to change sprites, have to do server sided still) client splash (finish last thing) added godwars speach base memory usage handled properly now | client.java search : private static void handleMemoryUsage() { global digging players will be kicked after 5 mins afk champion scrolls (mini-game only) yo-yo with emotes improved runescape range max hit ratio rocktail fishing completed (just need to make a few minor tweaks) - big fishing net style btw full shop prices for every item made (before some items cost 1 gp) glider system added moved curses alter (gnome glider -> Saldric -> whinch | will add requirements to enter later on) Treasure trails completed moulding system 100% - actionhandler under object switch statement is the interface method modified jewelry enchantment flax system + object disappearing & reappearing + timer birds nests random event ring of wealth (completely works I tried it on KBD) super heat base cow milking sailing teletabs - Ardougne, Watchtower, Camelot, Falador, Lumbridge, Varrock ticket system (::help *reason*) needs to be worked on majorly fixed dharoks attack anims (now has proper anims for different attack styles) working marionette anims - 6866 antifire pots empty ALL vials 100% cant teleport during combat fixed x-logging & the dupe method for it Phoenix necklace completed potato making base (just do useitem) bolt crafting base enhanced farming & supporting multi patches (un-finished) ring of dueling - needs to be fixed in clickingbuttons.java and then it's perfect trade accepted - dupe fix well system completed -> itemonobject class drop warning (example: drop AGS and it'll open a interface asking if you'd like to validate your action before hand) lunar hunter kit system perfected + required level, etc.. tanning hides - need to be fixed (clickingbuttons, and items on the interface) | interface ID = 14670 re-written fletching class, just need to add right click amounts cleaned out warnings from skill classses -> runecrafting, fishing, mining random event system - woodcutting, thieving, crafting force emote command - ::allvetemote clean out command - removes bank, worn, inv items on any user this command is used on. total in-game time npc give you veteran cape after 30 days (going to make changes though) commented out idlelogout method (IdleLogout.java - case 202) Standing on NPC fix (you can still talk to npcs if you're standing on them) math command (your choice to add rewards or not) dupe fix in bankx2.java ladder system 100% added casket system added close to 100 bank references (npcs, objects in which open up your bank) new level up GFX fixed stuck in duel arena bug sgs proper special attack (restores HP) added 100% exact runescape dialogues for Jad (enterance, reward, tiny reward for leaving the caves manually) all 63 waves of jad have now been added + npc effects 100% - needs mroe working on though asap Better Block Emotes - Combatassistant class godwars npcs are agress unless you have their gods armor (example: bandos room | no bandos armor in inv/wearing = npcs attacking you. Vice versa then they won't attack you (if you do have bandos on you) Npc death animation timer fix custom command for admins (max hybriding set) improved firemaking + clipped (only thing that needs work is = player starts fire and automaticly appears then 3 seconds later finishes the firemaking anim itself) god book creation 100% god book preaching low & high alching dupe fixed overload creation completed + requirements & exp reward prevent users from having the following in their names: mod", "Mod", "admin", "Admin", "owner", "Owner" healing monkey guards box sets (chisel on box = armor type death player - username: Death pass: 1234 (makes you look like death the NPC instead of regular character) open bank anywhere cheat exploit (anyone using bank cheat will be exploited over a server yell about it) ring of slaying limestone brick system (587 will allow you to make perfect bars, withouit it you'll take 8 damage and get nothing in return) | IDS: 3211 (limestone), 587 Limestone, 3420 Limestone bar inproved edgeville lever (over by coffins) - dialogues, warnings, returning back to edgeville warn command (how to use: ::warn_name space_message) itemonplayer class christmas cracker quest handler system cooks assistant quest started world map button 100% now duel arena log out fix (user logs out the opponent wins armor trimming (requirements varies on the armors iteself | example: rune trimmed you'd need to have 99 smithing, 90 smithing to trim black armor) fixed barrage orb veng on npc random event system for prayer re-written runecrafting (supports: multi runes, pouches, both ess types (each based on their own exp ratio) rouge den wall safes fixed Glitched Following (hard to explaing, but dw about it now) cant teleport out of fight pits minigame fix 500 total levels to trade wilderness warning sign (only bug is that it's level 1 wild when interface shows) better skill handler improved fletching improved runecrafting emotes handler system completed (handles emotes tab actions in a new class | EmoteHandler.java) brand new trade screen + wealth system (only 1 tiny bug that doesn't even matter really) improved Agility (supports: gnome agility course, Wildy course, barbarian outpost course, Brimhaven agility course, *MORE LATER*) + 99.5% anims & delays custom bonfires (needs delay and overall better handling) fixed alching dupe fixed trade bug (other player would offer items -> you click minimap and their items disapear) prospecting + timer flax spinning (item on object per *for now at least*) key theft @ crafting guild is now elimanated since mould interface set up with crafting guilds Poterry oven 2 floors for crafting guild *need bank to be on second floor though*

-Nick [4-10-12]
Finally had some time to try n fix it. Fixed it

-Nick [5-10-12]
Recoded woodcutting.

Fist of guthix [60%]
added all the safe coordinates
added target assignment
object interaction
point counter area depending on the region your in
append damage system when your within the safe house
interfaces
invalid items data [missing some food, etc]

Bounty hunter

Barbarian Assault [30%]
we have to hard code the interface for recruitment clans
I already hard coded the item for it.
Theres more to do

Map data
-Nex
-Tormented Demons
-Cool cave from the 614 revision

  • fixed certain 525 objects

Sound System

Music System

Rewrote Prayer
-Supports altar with sounds
-Handled all data through an enum
-Supports bone burying

10/1/12

-Fixed the cfg null load
-Fixed the single doors
-Added Double Doors

10/2/12

-Completely Rewrote Cooking Using grahams Cycle Event
-Added Sound Support to all items
-Added more data cooking is 70%
-Rewriting the burning formula soon

Started on the fishing base

[10/6/12]
Rewrote Firemaking
Started on grand exchange

--------------Client Updates--------------------------
Buffering System
Renamed a few methods
.Dat Loading System
Cache Packaging method
Camera Angle region system

--------------Misc---------------------------

Started working on the server framework for our chat
Started working on the client using sockets

Still more to come~

[hr]
OutDated Media

[img]http://s7.postimage.org/qipb7q4gr/barbarianassault.png[/img] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/cdji5wvff/coolcave.png[/img] [img]http://s17.postimage.org/4qulhmy33/corpbeast.png[/img] [img]http://s10.postimage.org/lpiaug1t5/tormdemons.png[/img] [img]http://s11.postimage.org/jq0dyn8z7/nex.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimage.org/f96u60iv5/construction.png[/img] [img]http://s14.postimage.org/f28gus5zl/summoningclipping.png[/img]

fog1.png765×496

fog2.png763×502

bounty.png1021×398

barbarianassault.png761×501

32players.png769×500
